name: ADVANCED AVIATION GROUP, S.L
about: Advanced Aviation Group, S.L is a comprehensive flight training institution offering both fixed-wing and rotary-wing training. We provide a range of programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and various instructor certifications. Our modern facilities include a full-service maintenance department with experienced mechanics. We offer discovery flights for newcomers and utilize state-of-the-art GPS-equipped aircraft. With a focus on precision and customer service, we are dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals in a supportive and professional environment. Our commitment to excellence ensures that every student receives the highest quality training.
